sentences.en: "Mum thinks I should stop imposing on your hospitality, Leo," said Grace.
sentences.cn: “利奥，我妈妈觉得我不应该再在这儿麻烦你了，”格雷丝说。

sentences.en: "You don't understand!" — "Oh, I think I do, Grace."
sentences.cn: “你根本就不明白！”——“噢，我想我明白，格雷丝。”

sentences.en: Grace allowed her mind to wander to other things.
sentences.cn: 格雷丝任由自己的思绪游走。

sentences.en: Grace broke off a large piece of the clay.
sentences.cn: 格雷斯掰下来一大块土。

sentences.en: Grace laid out the knives and forks at the lunch-table.
sentences.cn: 格雷丝把刀叉摆放在午餐桌上。

sentences.en: Grace Robertson started as a photographer with Picture Post in 1947.
sentences.cn: 格雷斯·罗伯逊于1947年参加工作，做了《图片邮报》杂志的一名摄影师。

sentences.en: Grace tapped on the bedroom door and went in.
sentences.cn: 格雷丝轻轻敲了敲卧室的门，走了进去。

sentences.en: Grace was flushed with the success of the venture.
sentences.cn: 格雷斯为冒险成功而感到兴奋。

sentences.en: He conducted himself with grace and dignity throughout the trial.
sentences.cn: 在整个审讯过程中他表现得文雅而有尊严。

sentences.en: He gestures, gesticulates, and moves with the grace of a dancer.
sentences.cn: 他举手投足之间流露出舞者的优雅。

sentences.en: It was only by the grace of God that no one died.
sentences.cn: 正是承蒙上帝的恩惠才没有人死去。

sentences.en: Lena moved with the grace of a dancer.
sentences.cn: 莉娜走路姿势有着舞者般的优美。

sentences.en: My father said grace .
sentences.cn: 我父亲做了饭前祷告。

sentences.en: She danced with a grace and lightness that were breathtaking.
sentences.cn: 她的舞跳得优雅轻盈，令人惊叹。

sentences.en: She hesitated, then put her hand on Grace's arm.
sentences.cn: 她犹豫了一下，然后把手放到格雷斯的胳膊上。

sentences.en: The hotel maintains traditional standards of elegance, style, and grace
sentences.cn: 这家酒店保持着传统的优雅体面格调。

sentences.en: We have only a few hours' grace before the soldiers come.
sentences.cn: 士兵到来之前我们只剩下几个小时了。

sentences.en: With appallingly bad grace I packed up and we drove north.
sentences.cn: 我很不情愿地收拾好行囊，然后我们驱车向北开去。

sentences.en: You will have to put up with Grace's absent-mindedness.
sentences.cn: 你须得忍受格蕾丝心不在焉的作风。

sentences.en: Your Grace, I have a great favour to ask of you.
sentences.cn: 大人，我想请您施以大惠。

phrases.phrase: be in someone's good (或 bad) graces

phrases.tran_cn: (希腊神话)美慧三女神（阿格拉伊亚、塔利亚和欧佛洛绪涅，宙斯之女，她们被认为代表并可以给予魅力、优雅和美丽）

phrases.phrase: there but for the grace of God (go I)
phrases.tran_cn: 天助我也（用来承认运气好，没有犯和别人一样的错误或遭遇同样的不幸）
乐意地，欣然地（或憎恨地，勉强地）

trans.tran_en: a smooth way of moving that looks natural, relaxed, and attractive
